entry.title: MC - 12" x 7" x 17" Kraft Paper Bag With Handle - 250/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 69.99

These brown shopping bags are a simple way to provide convenience to both you and your patrons!

Whether used for toting loaves of freshly baked bread or crisp vegetables and sweet, juicy fruits, these sturdy shopping bags will accommodate your customers' purchases easily, and won't break while carrying heavy loads. Because they're so durable, the bags can even be reused to help you and your shoppers be environmentally-friendly.

 

Durable Kraft Paper

Made from durable, brown kraft paper, these heavyweight bags have a basis weight and will carry heavy loads of produce, bakery items, and other purchases.

Rectangular Foundation

The rectangular foundation allows for it to stand alone for convenient packing and unpacking.

Twisted Handles

With twisted handles, these bags make all purchases easy for customers to carry.

MC - 12x7x17 Kraft Paper Bag With Handle - 250/Pack

entry.title: Full Circle - 2Lbs - Clear Poly Bags 4" x 2" x 10" - 500 / Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Full Circle
Type: Disposables
Price: 6.99

Details:

These Poly Bags are an ideal solution to packaging your everyday necessities. Whether it be bakery goods, restaurants or simply at a market stand showcasing your products. The plastic bags come in a case, separated and folded flat, allowing for easy dispensing. 

Designed with chef and catering professionals in mind, this plastic food bag is perfect for the foodservice industry! Manufactured from 100% virgin resin, this plastic contains no animal fats or heavy metals and is FDA-approved for safe food service, storage and handling, allowing you to safely store a variety of miscellaneous items ranging from bulky food components and raw materials to kitchen cleaning supplies.

Go with a bag that gives you convenience and durability. Linear low-density polyethylene (LLDPE) gives you increased flexibility, tensile strength making this bag less susceptible to tearing and puncturing. Made of LLDPE resins for maximum clarity, content identification will be fast and easy, keeping you up to pace in your busy kitchen or restaurant.

Plastic food Deli bag deal for packaging and stocking prepared foods, fruits, and vegetables in your restaurant, market, or bakery. Made of durable, polyethylene, plastic food bag combines exceptional clarity with excellent vapor and moisture resistance.

entry.title: McCall's - 1 Lb. White Paper Bag With Window & Tin Tie Closure - 25/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: McCall's
Type: Disposables
Price: 19.99

A creative package for displaying cookies & treats!

Perfect for packing cookies, cake pops and other baked goods, this tin tie cookie bag is just what your bakery, coffee shop or grocery store needs! Each bag features a clear window so customers can have a sneak peak at the goodies galore stored inside! To ensure freshness, each bag has a tin tie that allows bags to be resealed, which is attached to the back of the bag unless other placement is requested. Send your food out fresh and in style!

  • Laminated poly liner keeps contents fresh.
  • FDA and USDA compliant.
  • Metal tabs allow easy opening and a secure closure.

entry.title: WFN - S4 Printed White Biodegradable Shopping Bags 18" x 22" - 500/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: BulkMart
Type: Disposables
Price: 27.99

Take a green step forward with this biodegradable plastic t-shirt bag.

For a tough and durable plastic bag, choose this biodegradable t-shirt bag. With the same heat / cold tolerance and shelf life as traditional plastic bags, this environmentally-friendly option provides the same convenience without the wastefulness and damaging carbon footprint

Biodegradable, Reusable, and Recyclable

Made from environmentally friendly, recyclable HDPE material, this bag's construction allows decomposition. It fully breaks down much faster than other bags, therefore lowering your carbon footprint!

Attractive Color

The attractive color, along with the leafy design, is a step up from white plastic bags, while also demonstrating the bag's eco-friendliness.

Dual Handles

Great for carrying heavy items, the dual handles make this bag perfect for grocery stores, delis, take-out restaurants and more!

Both convenient and eco-friendly, t-shirt bags are perfect for grocery stores, delis, and take-out restaurants. They are just like regular plastic t-shirt bags, but are biodegradable and healthier for the environment!

Provide your customers with a durable bag for toting their purchases in with these T-shirt bags. These quality bags are made to resist ripping and tearing. This sturdy bag has the ability to successfully hold good weight! Its durable construction means that fewer bags can be used per customer, cutting down on cost.

Ideal for grocery stores, convenience stores, restaurants, and retail locations, lightweight T-shirt bag is perfect for bringing home groceries, to-go containers of food, or merchandize. The bag is thick and resists rips and tears to keep items from breaking through the material and falling out of the bag. Combined with the rip and tear resistant material, this bag also features convenient cutout handles for easy carrying. Furthermore, this bag is a cost effective and it can easily be recycled.

entry.title: SmartChoice - 17" Poly Net Mesh Bags Green - 1000 / Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: SmartChoice
Type: Disposables
Price: 29.99

SmartChoice - 17" Poly Net Bags Green - 1000 / Case

  • PERFECT FOR packaging produce, nuts, or shellfish. Ideal for independent sellers at farmers' or street markets, these bags can be quickly and efficiently filled with produce or other items. Sellers and customers will be impressed by the efficiency and ease!
  • PERFECT FOR COOKING SEAFOOD! These mesh bags can be used of boiling or steaming shellfish such as clams, mussels, or crawfish. By keeping the seafood in the bag, the whole bag can be lowered into the pot. Instead of taking the time to scoop each item out after cooking, the whole bag can be removed quickly and easily. These bags are completely safe to use in boiling water.
  • HEAT-SEALED BOTTOM, OPEN TOP: Each mesh bag is heat sealed on the bottom to keep the bag shut. The top is open and does not have a tie or drawstring. Bags can be closed by tying a knot. Bags can be reused, as there is no need to cut them open!
  • CUT DOWN ON WASTE! The plastic mesh fabric of our bags ensures complete breathability. Allowing produce such as onions and potatoes to breathe helps increase their lifespan. Less food waste means more savings!

entry.title: Norstar - 14" x 18" OD - Vacuum Bags 4 MIL Clear - 500 / Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norstar
Type: Disposables
Price: 136.99

Norstar - 14" x 18" OD - Vacuum Bags 4 MIL Clear - 500 / Case

Preserve and extend your food's shelf life with these  chamber vacuum packaging bags!

Great for a variety of applications, vacuum packaging pouches help extend the life of product while also preparing product for sous vide cooking. These particular bags are perfect for use with any chamber vacuum packaging machine, and each bag features an open end for inserting food, whether solid or liquid. Designed for industrial use, the bags are thick and resist punctures and abrasions to reliably preserve product.

Extends Life of Product

These industrial strength bags will help keep your food fresh up to five times longer than traditional storage methods, making it an extremely cost-effective alternative. This is great for planning specialty menus ahead of time or for using just a small amount of product and saving the rest for later.

Great Versatility

Securely sealing any solid or liquid product with a chamber vacuum packaging machine, this bag is designed to be frozen, refrigerated, or microwaved. Plus, it can withstand being boiled for up to minutes, allowing you to use it to cook directly in water. The heat resistance of the bag makes it great for sous vide cooking as well as for storage applications.

Securely sealing any solid or liquid product with a chamber vacuum packaging machine, this bag is designed to be frozen, refrigerated, or microwaved. Plus, it can withstand being boiled for up to minutes, allowing you to use it to cook directly in water. The heat resistance of the bag makes it great for sous vide cooking as well as for storage applications.
